Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Westbound Reroute near Belmont/Kenmore
ShortDescription: Update: WB 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Sheffield, Wellington, Racine and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kenmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Sheffield, Wellington, Racine and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kenmore.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Monroe
ShortDescription: SB 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Fullerton and 63rd
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Fullerton and 63rd due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Fullerton and 63rd due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between Howard and Fullerton, and,
  • between 63rdand 95th, only.

Shuttle buses are available between Fullerton and 63rd to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
